name: part_010
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目誕生日2022】HappyMeowthday!!な3D配信！！ [hrpubiRwB-k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora and AZKi perform the song "Sethnatic Code" as a duet.
MC section after the song performance. Sora and AZKi talk about Sora's new outfit.
IRyS joins the MC section via a monitor on stage. They discuss the live performances.
Tokino Sora announces her birthday merchandise with AZKi and IRyS.

subtitles.original: 夜の闇 引き摺り このまま隠れられなくて
subtitles.english: Dragging the darkness of the night, unable to hide as I am

subtitles.original: 静寂をかき消して 叫びたい声を歌に変えた
subtitles.english: Drowning out the silence, I turned the voice that wants to shout into a song

subtitles.original: いつもそこにある
subtitles.english: It's always there

subtitles.original: 隔て阻む壁も壊して進め
subtitles.english: Break down the walls that stand in the way and move forward

subtitles.original: 胸の奥にある
subtitles.english: Deep in my heart

subtitles.original: 忘れたふりで誤魔化し切れない鼓動
subtitles.english: A heartbeat I can't fully hide by pretending to forget

subtitles.original: 乗り越えてゆく
subtitles.english: Overcoming it

subtitles.original: 絡まった思い 音に変えて飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Turn entangled thoughts into sound and let them fly

subtitles.original: 生まれたメロディ 激しく鼓動奏で合う
subtitles.english: The born melody, heartbeats playing together intensely

subtitles.original: 言葉だけじゃ足りない 歌じゃなくちゃ届かない
subtitles.english: Words alone aren't enough, it won't reach without being a song

subtitles.original: 情熱が胸を熱くさせてく
subtitles.english: Passion makes my heart burn hotter

subtitles.original: 確かにここで分かり合えた鼓動
subtitles.english: A heartbeat that surely found understanding here

subtitles.original: 時の流れも逆らうように開かれる
subtitles.english: Opening up as if defying the flow of time

subtitles.original: 何度だって歌うから
subtitles.english: I'll sing it again and again

subtitles.original: 君の場所がいつも光に包み込まれるように
subtitles.english: So that your place is always enveloped in light

subtitles.original: 全てが崩れ出しそうで
subtitles.english: Everything seems about to crumble

subtitles.original: どこにも歩き出せない時は
subtitles.english: When I can't walk anywhere

subtitles.original: 送り続けるこの鼓動
subtitles.english: I'll keep sending this heartbeat

subtitles.original: 聞こえる場所探し 踏み出すよ
subtitles.english: Searching for a place where it can be heard, I step forward

subtitles.original: 遠くの星が呟くように光る
subtitles.english: Distant stars shine as if whispering

subtitles.original: いつも何かを伝えるように歌ってる
subtitles.english: Always singing as if to convey something

subtitles.original: 飲み込んだ思い 仰いだ空に飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Turn swallowed thoughts into the sky and let them fly

subtitles.original: 繋いだメロディ 流れる星に変わってゆく
subtitles.english: The connected melody turns into a shooting star

subtitles.original: 君のために歌うよ 君に届くようにと
subtitles.english: I sing for you, so that it reaches you

subtitles.original: 輝きは世界地図を越えてく
subtitles.english: The brilliance crosses the world map

subtitles.original: 確かにここで重ね合えた鼓動
subtitles.english: A heartbeat that surely overlapped here

subtitles.original: 触れ合う音が光になって降り注ぐ
subtitles.english: The sounds touching each other turn into light and pour down

subtitles.original: この一瞬が永遠だと
subtitles.english: This moment is eternity

subtitles.original: 煌めきは色付いてゆく 君と描いた世界
subtitles.english: The sparkle adds color to the world I drew with you

subtitles.original: 君と描く音が飛び立つ
subtitles.english: The sounds I draw with you take flight

subtitles.original: セツナチックコードまで
subtitles.english: Until the Sethnatic Code

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: AZKiちゃんありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you, AZKi-chan!

subtitles.original: そらちゃんお誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Sora-chan, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: そして、そしてこの新衣装！
subtitles.english: And, and this new outfit!

subtitles.original: もうね、あのリハーサルの時から
subtitles.english: Well, from the time of the rehearsal,

subtitles.original: こうもうずっと、「可愛い、可愛い」って。
subtitles.english: I was like "Cute, cute" all the time.

subtitles.original: 言ってた！実際言ってたね！
subtitles.english: You were! You really were!

subtitles.original: ずっと「可愛い可愛い」って言って。
subtitles.english: I kept saying "Cute, cute."

subtitles.original: ありがとう。ね、今日はね、なんで、
subtitles.english: Thank you. Right, today, well,

subtitles.original: 新衣装のそらちゃんと、そして
subtitles.english: to celebrate with Sora-chan in her new outfit, and

subtitles.original: 記念すべき今日をお祝いすることができて、
subtitles.english: to be able to celebrate today, this memorable day,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: makes me so happy!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: イエーイ、そらあずでした！
subtitles.english: Yay, that was SoraAz!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ここでは、やっぱり、
subtitles.english: Well then, I guess here,

subtitles.original: 歌の3人で喋りますか！
subtitles.english: we should talk as the singing trio!

subtitles.original: アイリスちゃーん！
subtitles.english: IRyS-chaaan!

subtitles.original: そらちゃんお誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Sora-chan, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: いや良かった、火花もめっちゃ良かった！
subtitles.english: No, it was great, Hibana was also really great!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！私ここにいていいのかな？
subtitles.english: Thank you! Is it okay for me to be here?

subtitles.original: こんな清楚で素敵なアイドル2人と一緒に、
subtitles.english: With two such pure and wonderful idols,

subtitles.original: こんな額縁が一緒にこの場所にいていいのかな？
subtitles.english: is it okay for a picture frame like me to be here?

subtitles.original: いいのかな？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: いいんだよ！
subtitles.english: It's okay!

subtitles.original: いいんだよ、可愛いよ！
subtitles.english: It's okay, you're cute!

subtitles.original: 火花もめっちゃ良かった！
subtitles.english: Hibana was also really great!

subtitles.original: ね、かっこよかったし、2人のデュエットも神、あ神。
subtitles.english: Right, it was cool, and your duet was God, ah God.

subtitles.original: あ神。みんな神だから。
subtitles.english: Ah, God. Because everyone is God.

subtitles.original: みんな神だね！
subtitles.english: Everyone is God!

subtitles.original: みんな神だよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone is God.

subtitles.original: 今日本当の神もいましたけどね。
subtitles.english: Although there was a real god today too.

subtitles.original: そらママ？リアル神がいた。
subtitles.english: Sora-mama? A real god was here.

subtitles.original: 100歳の神もいましたね。
subtitles.english: There was also a 100-year-old god.

subtitles.original: いましたね！確かに。
subtitles.english: There was! Truly.

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ。今日はね、こうみんなで楽しく、
subtitles.english: That's right. Today, well, I want us all to have fun,

subtitles.original: でもかっこよく、みんなの良いところが、
subtitles.english: but also look cool, and I hope all your good points

subtitles.original: いっぱい出るようにと思って歌を歌いたいので。
subtitles.english: come out a lot through these songs.

subtitles.original: 本当に今日は、そらちゃんの「好き」がね、
subtitles.english: Truly today, it's a live filled with

subtitles.original: たくさん詰まったライブだったなと思います。
subtitles.english: many of Sora-chan's "likes."

subtitles.original: みんなに「これ歌ってほしいな」っていうのを
subtitles.english: I just really asked everyone

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ、あの「これ歌って」って言っただけの。
subtitles.english: things like "I want you to sing this."

subtitles.original: あー、すごいすごい！選曲も
subtitles.english: Ah, amazing, amazing! The song selection

subtitles.original: そらちゃんの「好き」が詰まったライブでしたね！
subtitles.english: was also a live filled with Sora-chan's "likes"!

subtitles.original: はい！はい、じゃあここでね、もう後半なので。
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes, well, since it's already the second half.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、皆さんにもちょっと。
subtitles.english: I have something a little, for everyone too.

subtitles.original: お！プレゼントというか。
subtitles.english: Oh! Like a present.

subtitles.original: お！なんですか！待ってましたよ！
subtitles.english: Oh! What is it! We've been waiting!

subtitles.original: お誕生日のまさかグッズを作りましたので、
subtitles.english: I've made birthday merchandise, could it be,

subtitles.original: ぜひ見ていただけたらと思います！
subtitles.english: so I hope you'll take a look!

subtitles.original: グッズタイム！
subtitles.english: Goods time!

subtitles.original: それがこちらです！
subtitles.english: Here it is!

subtitles.original:
ときのそら誕生日記念2022
5月15日販売開始
subtitles.english:
Tokino Sora Birthday Celebration 2022
Sales start on May 15th
